cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, I shine so far, you see me during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear every day and help the flowers grow.
🔥 I'm a giant ball of burning gas.
🌎 I give the Earth light and warmth.

cosmos.question: I am round and I float in space, people dream of visiting me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese!
🌑 I change shape throughout the month.
🌎 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a giant group of stars, dust, and gas, and our sun lives in one! What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I look like a swirling pinwheel from far away.
✨ I contain billions of stars.
🥛 Our galaxy is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I'm a hot ball of gas that looks small because I'm far away, but I'm really, really big! What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔥 I give off light and heat.
🔭 There are billions of us in a galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am a big rock that orbits the sun, but I am not a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be found in a belt between Mars and Jupiter.
🪨 I am smaller than a planet.
✨ Some people think I am metallic.

cosmos.question: I am a very fast-moving rock from space that burns up in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 I am sometimes called a shooting star.
🔥 I leave a bright streak across the sky.
🌎 I am a space rock burning as I move through Earth's atmosphere

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Ursa Major is an example of me.
🌌 People used to use me for navigation.
✨ You can find me by stargazing on a clear night.

cosmos.question: I am a giant spinning ball of gas and dust, and I am much bigger than the Sun. Sometimes I am the result of a dying star. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My name has 'giant' in it, and I am usually red.
✨ I am a stage in the life cycle of some stars.
🔥 I will eventually collapse inward and possibly explode as a supernova.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that not even light can escape. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am formed from the collapse of a very massive star.
⚫ I am invisible, but my effects can be seen.
🌀 I warp spacetime.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, and stars are born inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 👶 I am a stellar nursery.
🌈 I can have beautiful colors.
✨ Stars are born inside me!

plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear a green coat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow tall and give shade.
🍃 I have leaves that change color in the fall.
🪵 You can climb me, but be careful of splinters.

plant.question: I am a plant that is red and juicy and good in salads. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I love sunshine.
🍅 I am often used to make sauces.
🫙 You can find me sliced in a jar.

plant.question: I have a bright yellow head and follow the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am a flower.
☀️ My face always turns toward the sun.
⚫ My seeds can be eaten.

plant.question: I’m green and leafy, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I'm often in salads.
🐰 Bunnies find me delicious!
🥬 Different types of me can be curly or flat.

plant.question: I'm a seed with a shell that grows on trees. Squirrels love to crack me open. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels bury me for winter.
🌰 I am often gathered in the fall.
🌳 Some of my shells are prickly.

plant.question: I have thorns and smell sweet, and my beauty is often used to show love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a flower.
❤️ I am often given on Valentine's Day.
🥀 My petals come in many colors.

plant.question: I am a long, green vegetable that grows on a vine and can be pickled. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am often eaten raw with dip.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
🧂 When preserved in vinegar, I turn into a crunchy snack.

plant.question: I have rings and am the age of a tree, but I am not jewelry. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can see me when a tree is cut down.
🗓️ Each one represents a year of growth.
🌲 I am made of wood.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant that can feed many people, and I am often popped. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in fields and have a husk.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🇺🇸 Many people eat me at Thanksgiving.

plant.question: I am a plant that gives us warmth and light, but I am not the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am burned to keep warm.
🪵 I can be used to build houses.
🌲 I come from trees.
